attributes.action: Change the requirement for members of the Armed Forces to pay Council Tax whilst on active service overseas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition was started as a consequence of learning that British troops are forced to pay council tax whilst on active service overseas in hostile situations like Iraq.
On active service, soldiers still pay for local services they are unable to use by virtue of the role we ask of them.

If like me you think this is unfair, I urge you to sign this petition to the government to change the way in which the armed forces are taxed.
